bug.author: caisq
bug.summary: [tfjs-vis] tfvis.render.heatmap() collapses rows or columns when there are duplicate labels
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
tfjs-vis 0.5.0 If there are duplciate items in xLabels and/or yLabels, the rows or columns will be collapsed, causing confusing displays. The displaying of the matrix should be done regardless of whether there are duplicate labels.

comments.comment: This fix is now available in <denchmark-link:https://www.npmjs.com/package/@tensorflow/tfjs-vis/v/1.2.0>https://www.npmjs.com/package/@tensorflow/tfjs-vis/v/1.2.0</denchmark-link>
